Name: Melon Maple Fizz
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: MUDDLE melon in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.
Review: Light, fruity and refreshing. Not overly sweet.
History: ADpted from a recipe created in 2014 by Manuel Terron, Midori Global Brand ambassador.
